title: Healthcare Competency Enhancement: Virtual Instructor Training for Emergency Remote Education Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics instruction experience and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Participants can complete a math project lesson design document within 3 days using tools like Google Classroom and Zoom
Participants can apply two or more interaction techniques that promote collaborative learning in virtual environments
Participants can identify core instructor support elements (technology, content, collaboration) in emergency remote education with 80% accuracy
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
